dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "Monika! We've been waiting for you!"

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "It's not like you to be this late to a club meeting!"

dialogue.name: yuri
dialogue.string: "It appears that you've brought some new members with you too."

dialogue.name: natsuki
dialogue.string: "Seriously, Monika? You brought a boy?"

dialogue.name: natsuki
dialogue.string: "Well, at least you found another girl too."

dialogue.name: natsuki
dialogue.string: (One who doesn't make me feel so small compared to the rest of you.)

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "Oh! I-"

dialogue.name: bf
dialogue.string: *stare*

dialogue.name: gf
dialogue.string: *stare*

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "...hello, you two. It's been a while."

dialogue.name: bf
dialogue.string: "Bep."

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "I'm sorry for what I did before."

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "And I'm sorry for inadvertently putting you in another situation just like that soon after-"

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "-but now that I'm here, everything should be stable."

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "I don't expect you to forgive me... but I'm glad you two are safe now."

dialogue.name: bf
dialogue.string: "Ska dee beep!"

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "Ahaha... You have no idea how happy I am to hear that."

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "Okay, everyone!"

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "I'd like you to meet the newest members of the Literature Club!"

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "And I've got a fun way I'd like to introduce them."

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "Hey, despite all that stressful stuff that just happened-"

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "-you have enough energy left for one more song?"

dialogue.name: bf
dialogue.string: "Ska dee beep!"

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "Then let's do it!"
